synopsis.text:
In the heart of Tokyo's vibrant Kabukicho district, a unique ensemble of seven eccentric individuals resides in a tenement managed by the enigmatic Mrs. Hudson. Among them is the world-renowned detective, Sherlock Holmes, who finds himself entangled in a chilling murder case that bears the unmistakable hallmark of Jack the Ripper.

This thrilling anime offers a captivating blend of everyday life and extraordinary adventures, as it delves into the past and present of Sherlock, his loyal companion Watson, and their intriguing housemates. Through a series of six engaging short stories, viewers are granted an exclusive peek into the lives of these colorful characters, revealing their quirks, camaraderie, and the occasional brush with the darker side of Kabukicho.

Prepare to be enthralled by the dynamic interplay between Sherlock, Watson, Moriarty, and the rest of the Detective's Row House, as they navigate the bustling streets of Kabukicho, where neon lights conceal sinister secrets. Join them in their quest to unravel mysteries and witness their unique bond in this captivating collection of tales.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
